data.name: Dick Hook
data.detailed_description:
Dick Hook is a fun third person game in which you will have to attract naked girls with your dick !!! Draw all the girls in the game, without exception! Visit colorful winter locations and real space! Play and have fun with pleasant music!

This third-person game will give you unforgettable emotions and even children's delight. You will need to attract girls with your dick! It sounds crazy, but it is. Don't miss a single girl and hit the highest possible score you can! With funny music, immerse yourself in this exciting process and get great pleasure from this game!

Features of the game:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Beautiful naked girls who are nice to watch!
Very beautiful graphics!
Picturesque locations!

data.short_description: Dick Hook is a fun third person game in which you will have to attract naked girls with your dick !!! Draw all the girls in the game, without exception! Visit colorful winter locations and real space! Play and have fun with pleasant music!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for adults only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
